sentence.Network_en: Aymara, Quechua and other Native Americans were used as labor in these efforts.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 印加人的后裔是今安地斯山脉操克丘亚语（quechua）(Quechua)的农民，可能占秘鲁人口的45%。他们用简单的传统技术，农牧结合。
盖丘亚语（Quechua）是南美印第安人的一大分支。“坚强”:kallpayoj注解：“kallpa”与“kallpayoj”意思差不多kallpa=strengthkallpayoj=st…

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a South American Indian people in Peru who were formerly the ruling class of the Inca empire
2. the language of the Quechua which was spoken by the Incas
